description.en:
Ixian is a peer to peer encrypted data streaming platform, which handles a high volume of micro transactions.

About Ixian Platform and IxiCash

As remote work and social distancing are becoming the new norm, more people are relying on streaming services for communication. Traditional services rely on expensive infrastructure to handle millions of new users and amount of data transferred. This infrastructure needs constant maintenance and upgrades but is only being used at full capacity at certain peaks.

Ixian DLT - High throughput of micropayments with microfees

Ixian was built to overcome these issues. By leveraging the user’s hardware we can improve reliability and enable users to monetize their hardware and bandwidth, depending on network needs. Ixian relies on its users to form a secure and efficient network with no downtime.

Ixian S2 - Decentralized data streaming with incentives for node operators

You can already download and use the first decentralized app that utilizes Ixian technology, it’s called Spixi and it is a secure next generation chat app, with no central authority which can access your personal data.

Ixian is the kind of platform developers will want to use to build and monetize solutions that require scaling and secure data streaming capabilities. Services utilizing Ixian require smaller operating budgets and thus can be offered at competitive pricing. While paying less, users won’t need to worry about data leaks, privacy issues or censorship.

status_updates.description:
BEAM UP!
On our way to Ixian Omega Protocol we have just activated BLOCK V8 and TX V6!
Big updates that will allow us to lift the cap from the current 666 TPS!

We have released updated versions of:
Ixian DLT node v0.8.0
Ixian S2 v0.4.8
Spixi Bot Pre-Release v0.5.3
Spixi got Portugese Localization in the newly released v0.6.2

Many improvements and fixes, and we are now ready for the first IxiCash emission reduction!

New updates available:
- Ixian DLT v0.7.6a
- Ixian S2 v0.4.7a
- Ixian LiteWallet v0.7.6b

- Spixi v0.6.1
- Spixi Bot PR v0.5.2

Read the change log and download the latest version from our GitHub:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian

New updates available:
- Ixian DLT v0.7.6
- Ixian S2 v0.4.7
- Spixi v0.6.0
- Ixian LiteWallet v0.7.6a

Read the change log and download the latest version from our GitHub:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian

New maintenance update #Ixian DLT v0.7.5e is available:

Get the latest from our GitHub:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-DLT/releases/tag/v0.7.5e

Update your nodes for best performance!

New maintenance update #Ixian DLT v0.7.5c is available:
- fixed issue with Network Queue
- fixed walletNotify and blockNotify config parameters

Get the latest from our GitHub:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-DLT/releases/tag/v0.7.5c

Read this article on Medium for a short rundown of the new proposal:
https://medium.com/ixian/lets-talk-about-emission-5345db98e222
After that check out all the charts and numbers on the IxiCash Emissions page on our Block Explorer:
https://explorer.ixian.io/?p=emissions
and join the discussion on our Discord: 
https://discord.gg/TVq9uankVE

We would love to hear your thoughts.

We released a maintenance update for Ixian DLT node v0.7.5b, which fixed certain issues with block/signature propagation and with optimized inventory. Please upgrade your nodes for best performance and stability.
Get it on our GitHub Repo:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-DLT/releases/tag/v0.7.5b
